title: Tata powers up wind energy market with mega order; seeks bids for supply of turbines with capacity of 3 GW
description: Tata Power is pursuing bids for wind turbines to equip its wind-solar hybrid renewable energy projects, expecting to install over 3GW with a potential expansion to 5GW over five years. Major manufacturers like Siemens Gamesa and Suzlon are involved, with investments estimated at $9 billion.
